[[inst_swapb]]
==== SWAPB

*Syntax:* swapb<.{aq, rl, f, aqrl, aqf, rlf, aqrlf}> [SrcL], SrcR, {->t, ->u, ->Rd}

*Description:* Atomic Swap: atomically exchange values between register and memory.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_swapb.svg[SWAPB encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/AMO
